item.title: Problems with Neo-Account Maker
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

put the script in code tags and we might wanna help you more. because i dont know if its just me(im sure not)but if i see a script just posted like this and not in tags then i press that big arrow on my browser that points backwards.[br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 07:53:25 PM[/size][hr]but you know since its christmas and im feeling nice ill fix your script for you
ok you did alot of things wrong. here is the fixed script, i made it to where it at least compiles now. it wont do the things you want it to do, but you try and figure out how to make it

[code]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Neo-Account Maker

Author = Jason2gs

Version = 1.0

Date = 12-22-06

Comments = I might add a key-stroke randomizer for the username in the future.

/Script Info}

// You need to fill out a username and an email adress.
// Everything else is done for you.

program NeoAccountMaker;

var
i: integer;
character: array of string;

procedure StartItUp;
begin
ClickMouse(340, 555, True);
sleep(2500)
ClickMouse(475, 335, True);
end;
// Randomizer start

procedure SetItUp;
begin
character:= [‘a’,‘b’,‘c’,‘d’,‘e’,‘f’,‘g’,‘h’,‘i’,‘j’,‘k’,‘l’,‘m’,‘n’,‘o’,‘p’,‘q’,‘r’,‘s’,‘t’,‘u’,‘v’,‘w’,‘x’,‘y’,‘z’,‘1’,‘2’,‘3’,‘4’,‘5’,‘6’,‘7’,‘8’,‘9’,‘0’];
end;

procedure KeepOn;
begin
setItUp;
for i:= 1 to 5 do
sendkeys(character[1+random(36)]);
end;

// Randomizer end

begin
SendKeys(‘Username’); //Type your username here
ClickMouse(475, 380, True);
SendKeys(‘123password123’); //Any password you want can go here
ClickMouse(475, 420, True);
SendKeys(‘123password123’); //Confirm password
ClickMouse(475, 480, True);
SendKeys(‘FirstName’); //First Name
ClickMouse(475, 515, True);
SendKeys(‘LastName’); //Last Name
ClickMouse(475, 550, True);
SendKeys(‘emailadress@blank.com’); //Type your Email adress here
ClickMouse(475, 585, True);
SendKeys(‘emailadress@blank.com’); //Type it again here (confirmation)
ClickMouse(1013, 450, True);
ClickMouse(475, 160, True);
ClickMouse(475, 190, True);
ClickMouse(550, 155, True);
ClickMouse(550, 190, True);
ClickMouse(610, 160, True);
ClickMouse(610, 190, True);
ClickMouse(475, 190, True);
ClickMouse(475, -85, True);
ClickMouse(475, 220, True);
ClickMouse(475, 220, True);
ClickMouse(475, 305, True);
SendKeys(‘MyPlace’);
ClickMouse(475, 340, True);
SendKeys(‘12345’);
ClickMouse(455, 370, True);
ClickMouse(215, 405, True);
ClickMouse(215, 485, True);
ClickMouse(1010, 550, True);
ClickMouse(435, 320, True);
end.[/code]

things you did wrong:

line12 you tried to make your program a procedure. program just names the script.
so i had to name a new procedure there. and also you forgot the end; at the end of that procedure.

line 29 you didnt even name a procedure. you just started with begin. so i named a procedure there.

and on your main loop you didnt put begin. for main loops you dont have to name a procedure, just put begin.

and your main loops is kinda weird, i’d seperate it into individual procedures. ill let you try and figure out how to do that yourself. you try and do that then post the script here again and ill tell you how it should be done and fix it for you.

i think thats all that i fixed, just compare my fixed version to yours. and you’ll see how everything should be.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with Neo-Account Maker
item.dc:creator: @jason2gs jason2gs
item.description:
@jason2gs wrote:

My error:

Line 20: [Error] (20:1): Identifier expected in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\Scripts\Neo-Account Maker.scar

My script:

[code]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Neo-Account Maker

Author = Jason2gs

Version = 1.0

Date = 12-22-06

Comments = I might add a key-stroke randomizer for the username in the future.

/Script Info}

// You need to fill out a username and an email adress.
// Everything else is done for you.

program NeoAccountMaker;
begin
ClickMouse(340, 555, True);
sleep(2500)
ClickMouse(475, 335, True);

// Randomizer start

var
i: integer;
character: array of string;

procedure setItUp;
begin
character:= [‘a’,‘b’,‘c’,‘d’,‘e’,‘f’,‘g’,‘h’,‘i’,‘j’,‘k’,‘l’,‘m’,‘n’,‘o’,‘p’,‘q’,‘r’,‘s’,‘t’,‘u’,‘v’,‘w’,‘x’,‘y’,‘z’,‘1’,‘2’,‘3’,‘4’,‘5’,‘6’,‘7’,‘8’,‘9’,‘0’];
end;

begin
setItUp;
for i:= 1 to 5 do
sendkeys(character[1+random(36)]);
end;

// Randomizer end

SendKeys(‘Username’); //Type your username here
ClickMouse(475, 380, True);
SendKeys(‘123password123’); //Any password you want can go here
ClickMouse(475, 420, True);
SendKeys(‘123password123’); //Confirm password
ClickMouse(475, 480, True);
SendKeys(‘FirstName’); //First Name
ClickMouse(475, 515, True);
SendKeys(‘LastName’); //Last Name
ClickMouse(475, 550, True);
SendKeys(‘emailadress@blank.com’); //Type your Email adress here
ClickMouse(475, 585, True);
SendKeys(‘emailadress@blank.com’); //Type it again here (confirmation)
ClickMouse(1013, 450, True);
ClickMouse(475, 160, True);
ClickMouse(475, 190, True);
ClickMouse(550, 155, True);
ClickMouse(550, 190, True);
ClickMouse(610, 160, True);
ClickMouse(610, 190, True);
ClickMouse(475, 190, True);
ClickMouse(475, -85, True);
ClickMouse(475, 220, True);
ClickMouse(475, 220, True);
ClickMouse(475, 305, True);
SendKeys(‘MyPlace’);
ClickMouse(475, 340, True);
SendKeys(‘12345’);
ClickMouse(455, 370, True);
ClickMouse(215, 405, True);
ClickMouse(215, 485, True);
ClickMouse(1010, 550, True);
ClickMouse(435, 320, True);
end.[/code]

Please help =D
